'''''Parma Eldalamberon 7''''' is the seventh issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|6|8}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Lung Ulu" — poem by Christopher Gilson, art by Tom Loback

* Articles
** "Lung Ulu" — [[Christopher Gilson]]
** "''Im Naitho'', a Poem with Notes"
** "First Person Possessive in High-Elven" — Christopher Gilson
** "Chart of Body Parts in Various Languages" — [[Tom Loback]]
** "''Corma Laire Quenyasse'': The Ring Poem in Quenya" — [[Jorge Quiñónez]]
** "''A Working English Lexicon'', by [[Paul Nolan Hyde]]" — reviewed by Jorge Quiñónez
** "''Quettar Quentava Eldalamberon'': Notes on the History of The Elven Languages" — Stanley Friesen

* Art: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 7 page 21.png|Chart of Body Parts]]" — Tom Loback
* Art: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 7 page 28.png|A Map of Northern Beleriand]]" — Tom Loback
* Art: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 7 page 29.png|Battle of the North March]]" — Tom Loback
* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 7 (back cover).png|Im Naitho]]" — art by Tom Loback
